snippet: Bank of America customers were unable to access their online banking accounts, mobile payment systems or the company's telephone call centers on Friday. But it does not appear to be the result of hacking.
abstract: Bank of America customers were unable to access their online banking accounts, mobile payment systems or the company's telephone call centers on Friday. But it does not appear to be the result of hacking.

byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH, BEN PROTESS and JESSICA SILVER-GREENBERG

headline.main: Bank of America Suffers Widespread Outages; Hacking Is Not Suspected
